Title: Relates to the amount of state aid reimbursement for public health services by a municipality in the city of New York
Summary: Relates to the amount of state aid reimbursement for public health services by a municipality in the city of New York when the municipality is providing some or all of certain identified core public health services.
LawCode: Amd ยง605, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to state aid reimbursement for public health services provided by a municipality in the city of New York
